description: Hiromi is a lively highschool freshman who recently joint the tennis club of her school. She did it expecially due to admiration toward Ryuuzaki Reika aka Ochofujin, the ace of the club, However what was at first just a little hobby after school, soon became the center of her life. The new coach Munataka Jin has a eye on her potential and she`s soon become an member of the competition team despite her opposition at first.
name: Oka Hiromi
